cast.overview: Fired from his band and hard up for cash, guitarist and vocalist Dewey Finn finagles his way into a job as a fifth-grade substitute teacher at a private school, where he secretly begins teaching his students the finer points of rock 'n' roll. The school's hard-nosed principal is rightly suspicious of Finn's activities. But Finn's roommate remains in the dark about what he's doing.
cast.title: School of Rock

details.biography: Kimberly Grigsby is known for School of Rock (2003), Spring Awakening: Those You've Known (2022) and ShowBusiness: The Road to Broadway (2007).
details.name: Kimberly Grigsby
